resources.string: สวิทช์อินเทอร์เน็ต
การตั้งค่า
สวิทช์อินเทอร์เน็ต

You\'re using \"Internet Switcher\" application.
Turn on/off your WiFi or Mobile internet connection any time you need.
Note, that you cannot enable WiFi and Mobile internet at the same time.
If your device supports traffic statistics, you will see it below the switches. Note, that not all devices show it properly(for now). Traffic statistics resets after rebooting your phone.

We\'re going to create also a widget for this app. If you want to see more features in this app and you want to support us, please visit our page http://rubchick.com/help-us/
Thank you for using our projects.
